about.intro:
Guess the Stadtbahndle in 6 tries.

Each guess must a be a valid train trip involving 3 trains using valid interchanges between them.

You need to guess a specific set of three trains that can make the trip.
about.created: Created by <1>Sunny NG</1> and adapted to the Cologne rapid transit system by <3>Marie</3>.
about.kvb_notice: Special Thanks to the <1>KVB</1> for their <3>Open Data service</3>!
